divs: Sighting DetailsI was wathing tv when I.saw a light darting.around in.the sky..i knew it couldnt be.a plane. So I ran outside and got the neighbors. I watched it for about half a hour.as it hovered notio.less ove ou eastern sacramento. It movef about 3 more tomes but wss.motionless.before slowly drifting behind the trees. I called the police and.the news but they both vere very dismissive. I went inside about 9 & didnt sleep much.
